artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Olive warp. 3/16-1/2" strips of olive, green, blue & black leather separated with olive threads form the weft.  Stapled to 8.50x11" card.  "H-3" printed on card. (olive, green, blue, black)
title: Leather Cloth
